About the Role: We are looking for a passionate and experienced Software Development Engineer II (SDE-2) to join our dynamic engineering team. As an SDE-2, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to build scalable systems, drive best practices, and mentor junior engineers.  Key Responsibilities: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and performant backend or frontend systems.  Collaborate with Product Managers, Designers, and other Engineers to define, design, and deliver new features.  Take ownership of components or services, from design to deployment.  Participate in code reviews and uphold high standards of code quality and architecture.  Diagnose performance issues and fix bugs to ensure a smooth user experience.  Mentor junior developers and help them grow technically.  Write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.  Contribute to engineering processes, tools, and standards.

To summarize, you're looking for an experienced Software Development Engineer II (SDE-2) to join the remote team on a full-time basis, with the salary range of 7 lakhs to 9 lakhs. The ideal candidate will have 2 years of experience and be capable of designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions. The urgency for filling the position is immediate due to the remote nature of the work. The candidate's attitude should reflect good behavior and a passion for their work. He/She should be comfortable taking ownership of components or services and willing to mentor junior developers. Thank you for the information provided. I've logged this internally. I'll surface suitable profiles soon — and flag urgent ones first.

aiReply:
Job Title: Software Development Engineer - Head of Frontend Engineering

Job Summary:
We are seeking an experienced and motivated Software Development Engineer with a strong focus on frontend development to lead our frontend engineering team. As the Head of Frontend Engineering, you will design and develop innovative, user-friendly, and high-performance web applications that meet the needs of our users and drive business growth. You will oversee a team of engineers, focus on delivering scalable, maintainable code, and continuously improve the quality of our frontend systems.

Responsibilities:
- Lead and mentor a team of frontend engineers, providing guidance, coaching, and feedback for their technical and professional growth.
- Collaborate with design, product, and backend teams to define, design, and deliver high-quality web applications.
- Drive the adoption of modern frontend technologies, frameworks, and best practices.
- Own the end-to-end engineering process for our frontend applications, including design, implementation, testing, bug-fixing, and deployment.
- Ensure the performance, scalability, and maintainability of our frontend applications.
- Implement security features, accessibility best practices, and other measures to provide an exceptional user experience for all users.
- Collaborate with other engineering leaders to identify and solve cross-functional challenges in our frontend systems.
- Develop and maintain relevant documentation, including technical specifications, design documents, and user guides.
- Participate in code reviews, technical discussions, and other engineering initiatives to continuously improve the effectiveness and efficiency of our frontend team.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 5+ years of experience as a Frontend Engineer or similar technical role.
- Proven leadership experience, with a track record of successfully managing and mentoring a team of software engineers.
- Expertise in modern frontend technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, and Vue.js.
- Strong foundation in computer science principles, algorithms, and data structures.
- Experience working with agile methodologies, Scrum, and Kanban.
- Strong communications and organizational skills, with an ability to work effectively and collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with an ability to identify and resolve complex technical challenges.
- Passion for continuous learning, staying up-to-date with the latest developments in the field of frontend engineering.

I’ve logged this internally. I’ll surface suitable profiles soon — and flag urgent ones first.
